name: Sloth
tagline: A command line tool to automate the process of installing packages and apps on your mac.
body:
![Sloth screenshot](https://source.xing.com/raw/marcio-barrios/sloth/master/screenshot.png)

# How to use it?
Open **Terminal app** and just execute the following command:
```shell
# Use your LDAP credentials if needed
git clone https://source.xing.com/marcio-barrios/sloth.git && cd sloth && ./install.sh
```

If you want to add more apps or adapt Sloth to your needs read more about it in the [repository page](https://source.xing.com/marcio-barrios/sloth).
